**Example 1: CreateEdgeUnitDevices**



Input: 

```
tccli iecp CreateEdgeUnitDevices --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DeviceNames link02 link01 \
    --EdgeUnitId 100067 \
    --ProductId SA4RZ3NLIM
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "f1ba65ee-80cd-4462-80ff-79620c149c12"
    }
}
```
